name: Heartbreaker
descrip: Powerful Erotic magic that arouses your target. Lowers the target's Willpower, but removes any lingering Charm effects.
outcome: [AttackerName] fires a pink beam of magic at [TargetName], filling [TargetHisOrHer] body with warm, radiating bliss that makes [TargetHisOrHer] shiver in delight.
miss: [AttackerName] fires a pink beam of magic at [TargetName], but it seems to have no effect on [TargetHimOrHer].
statusOutcome: |f|RemoveStatusEffectFromMonster|/|Charm|n|The backlash from the spell knocked [TargetName] out of their infatuation!
